cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: This site uses cookies to improve user experience.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.content: These are small text files stored in your browser.

section3.title: 3. How to manage cookies?
section3.content: You can change cookie settings in your browser or disable them entirely.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: LocaliQ respects your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

section1.title: 1. Data we collect
section1.item2: Contact and geolocation data if you add a producer

section2.title: 2. How we use data
section2.content: For registration, authorization, improving platform functionality, and contacting you.

section3.title: 3. Third parties
section3.content: We do not share your data with third parties except as required by law.

section4.title: 4. Data protection
section4.content: We use modern security measures to protect your data.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: By using the LocaliQ platform, you agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree — please do not use our website.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.content: The platform provides information about local producers. We are not responsible for the accuracy of data submitted by users.

section2.title: 2. Accounts
section2.content: You are responsible for protecting your account credentials. We reserve the right to suspend or delete an account in case of violations.

section3.title: 3. User content
section3.content: You guarantee that any content you post is truthful and does not infringe the rights of third parties.

section4.title: 4. Changes
section4.content: We may change these terms without prior notice. The current version is always available on this page.
